about_the_game:
Prepare to venture deeper into the haunted halls of the Frightsylvania Hotel with this chilling DLC, offering players an immersive expansion packed with dark secrets, ancient legends, and even more challenging puzzles! In this expansive addition, players will unlock access to four brand-new, eerie locations that push the boundaries of mystery and intrigue. Uncover hidden objects, piece together intricate riddles, and explore gloomy decorations that tell frightening stories of the past. This DLC offers additional content, enriching your knowledge about the castle and its enigmatic inhabitants, and revealing unsettling truths about the supernatural forces at play.

Get ready to step into unexplored corners of the hotel where legends come to life, the past whispers through ancient relics, and every clue you uncover brings you closer to unraveling the full story of Frightsylvania!

🎈 CASTLE MUSEUM SECRETS!

Explore the museum’s collection of paintings and ancient relics. Solve the riddle of the grand clock and reveal the truth behind the weapons that once guarded the castle. The walls of the museum hold centuries of hidden stories waiting to be uncovered!

🎈 UNVEIL ABRAHAM’S DARK PAST!

Investigate the monster hunter’s tent, hidden away in the shadows. Search through his personal belongings, read his diary, and discover if there’s anything unusual about this mysterious figure. Could the bats be warning you of the lurking danger?

🎈 WANDER THROUGH AN ANCIENT CEMETERY!

The crypts and sculptures of the cemetery hide more than just graves. Ancient secrets and family legacies buried for centuries could hold the answers you seek. But beware, as every step through this place brings you closer to uncovering hidden truths that may change everything!

🎈 DISCOVER THE SECRETS OF DEMETRIUS'S CAVE!

At the foot of the mountain, a hidden cave awaits. Search through its curious objects and solve the mind-bending puzzles within to uncover useful information about the inhabitants of the Frightsylvania Hotel and their hidden connections!

With this DLC, every shadowy corner hides a new mystery, and every discovered artifact brings you closer to uncovering the chilling truth behind the Frightsylvania Hotel’s haunting history!

short_description: Are you ready to unlock the hidden past and confront the dark forces that dwell within Hotel walls, or will the castle’s secrets remain buried forever?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
